dcterms:creator: Y. Katayama
T. Yamane
D. Nakano
dcterms:description: Log-scale encoding of information is utilized in the context of computing with waves, playing a critical role in bridging classical and quantum computing models.
dcterms:title: Log-scale encoding of information

dcterms:creator: Y. Katayama
dcterms:description: Wave dynamics are discussed as a critical aspect of the proposed quantum-inspired computing model, emphasizing energy efficiency and integration.
dcterms:title: Wave dynamics

dcterms:creator: W. Maass
dcterms:description: The spiking neural network (SNN) model is referenced as a foundational framework for understanding temporal coding and neural operations in the proposed quantum-inspired computing model.
dcterms:title: Spiking neural network (SNN) model

dcterms:creator: C. Singh
W. B. Levy
dcterms:description: Temporal coding is discussed in the context of neural operations, highlighting its importance in the proposed quantum-inspired computing framework.
dcterms:title: Temporal coding

dcterms:creator: Y. Katayama
dcterms:description: Neural operations in quantum-inspired computing (QIC) are explored, emphasizing the integration of wave-based dynamics and spiking neural networks.
dcterms:title: Neural operations in QIC

dcterms:creator: J. Preskill
dcterms:description: Quantum-inspired computing (QIC) is discussed as a model that can potentially unify artificial intelligence and quantum computing, particularly in the NISQ era.
dcterms:title: Quantum-inspired computing (QIC)

dcterms:creator: J. Biamonte
dcterms:description: Quantum machine learning is referenced as a significant area of research that intersects with the proposed quantum-inspired computing model.
dcterms:title: Quantum machine learning

dcterms:creator: C. I. J. Stuart
Y. Takahashi
H. Umezawa
dcterms:description: Neural memory is discussed as a macroscopic ordered state, contributing to the understanding of brain dynamics in the context of quantum-inspired computing.
dcterms:title: Neural memory
